transform_sql_select: SELECT TRIM(SUBSTR(delete_invoice_data_str, 1, 1)) AS record_type,TO_TIMESTAMP((TRIM(SUBSTR(delete_invoice_data_str, 2, 14))),'yyyyMMddHHmmss') AS creation_datetime FROM read_deleted_invoice_header_vw

SELECT h.header_id, TRIM(SUBSTR(delete_invoice_data_str, 1, 1)) AS record_type,TRIM(SUBSTR(delete_invoice_data_str, 2, 12)) AS invoice_number FROM read_deleted_invoice_detail_vw JOIN db_read_deleted_invoice_header_vw h

SELECT h.header_id, TRIM(SUBSTR(delete_invoice_data_str, 1, 1)) AS record_type,TRIM(SUBSTR(delete_invoice_data_str, 2, 10)) AS invoice_count FROM read_deleted_invoice_trailer_vw JOIN db_read_deleted_invoice_header_vw h
